level.text: On or before February 15, 2013, the Office of the State Superintendent of Education shall transmit to the Council a strategic plan for increasing access to, participation in, and the quality of an interscholastic athletics program in District of Columbia Public Schools and public charter schools by the 2014-2015 school year.
The strategic plan shall include a description of:
The level of programs needed to ensure greater access to interscholastic athletics;
The resources required to operate a robust interscholastic athletics program throughout the public schools;
How District facilities may be better utilized to provide for interscholastic athletics; and
The effect of a robust athletics program on student health and community involvement.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-168 added this section.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of section, see § 4062(i) of the Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-413, July 25, 2012, 59 DCR 9290), applicable as of June 20, 2012.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 4063 of D.C. Law 19-168 provided that § 4062 of the act shall apply as of June 20, 2012.
